person spirituall worship giuen father 2 time spirituall worship shall giuen vnto houre commeth first bee obserued sauiour speaking worship christian giue vnto god farre better iewes vsed call god woman yet done nothing hitherto earnestly desire yea professeth meate finish perfect father worke hath true zeale rest thing hath already done still endeauour goe forward better hath beene finish worke well two branch see property 1 hath true zeale carefull grow goe forward one essentiall property true zeale desire grow see plaine example paul attained great measure done much seruice god yet woman hearing themselues 4 fruit effect whereby declared faith namely profession make vnto woman beene first instrument draw vnto christ first foure point handled finished last day followeth proceed containe comfort satisfaction ruler receiued christ beene sharply rebuked herein grace mercy christ appeared two point first shewed diuine power cure euen bodily infirmity secondly request man weake faith ruler former finished last day remaines proceed latter namely want weakness ruler notwithstanding christ granted request healed childe may better receiue instruction example must obserue three point first great ignorance want faith ruler time craued helpe christ sonne secondly great goodnesse respect christ shewed vnto notwithstanding thirdly reason christ shew respect ignorant weake man said concerning sinne beares saith sinne secondly yeeldeth vnto importunity healeth sonne desired thirdly lastly grant desire could hope hand whereas desired would go downe heale sonne verse 47 49 would haue required time christ doth immediately deliuer childe paine danger restoreth health reason moued christ shew respect weake man third point told obserued text though chiefly himselfe euen owne mercy shewed mercy pleased doe rom 9 18 yet doubtlesse respect vnto small seedes beginning faith vprightnesse heart discerned saw first came helpe honest heart perswasion able willing doe good best cannot wholly free himselfe selfeloue ouermuch respect himselfe onely duty calling euen god worship yet hath first though sundry particular action faile yet ordinarily course life hath respect
